title: The Second Korean War
description: "This book was like Tom Clancy reincarnated. Ted Halstead really knows how to write a thriller. Can't wait for more!"Two Russian agents discover a missing nuclear weapon was hidden in an American city by North Korea. Another nuclear weapon nears Seoul in a tunnel built by North Koreans. And North Korea's new military dictator launches an all-out invasion. Will Seoul or Pyongyang be the new capital of a united Korea?
author: Ted Halstead
